title: Spiritual melody, containing near three hundred sacred hymns. By Benjamin Keach, author of Trhopolgia, pastor of the Church of Christ meeting on Horsly-down, Southwark
author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
publisher: printed for John Hancock, in Castle-Alley, near the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill,
notes: With a table of contents, errata on p. [24], and an advertisment at the foot of p. 384.
Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
